original_text: Even if our thoughts tell us that we have done something wrong, we still will not be afraid of God. We can trust God more than we trust our thoughts. He already knows everything about us.
korean_text: 이는 우리 마음이 혹 우리를 책망할 일이 있어도 하나님은 우리 마음보다 크시고 모든 것을 아시기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: Even if our thoughts tell us
that we have done something wrong
we still will not be afraid of God
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 여전히 하나님을 두려워하지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: more than we trust our thoughts

sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 이미 모든 것을 알고 계십니다
